document_data.name: ''Famous Legends and Lore of the North''
document_data.author: [[Amorthas]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Famous Legends and Lore of the North''''' was a [[book]] published by the sage [[Amorthas|Amorthas of Ruathym]] in [[1344 DR]].{{Cite dragon/230/Wyrms of the North: Arauthator|38}}

{{Quote|''The spark of revenge still kindles the fire that warms his heart to carry him on through the centuries.''|Amorthas discussing the cunning & patience of Arauthator.}}
document_data.Description: This book discussed some of the most well known myths and legendary figures of [[northwest Faer√ªn]]. This included the legendary [[white dragon]], [[Arauthator]].
